directions: In a saucepan over medium high heat, combine sugar and water. Cook, stirring, until mixture comes to a boil. Boil for 30 seconds to 1 minute. Remove from heat and allow to cool. Stir in drink mix powder.
To serve:  Stir 1 tablespoon syrup into 8 ounces milk, or to taste.
ingredients: 1 (0.13 ounce) package unsweetened, fruit-flavored soft drink mix
title: Flavored Milk Syrup
